content: Our mortgage origination segment, however, was not immune to the impact of rising rates and recorded an adjusted loss of roughly $10 million for the quarter or negative $0.05 in adjusted earnings per share. Turning to the results, the company generated adjusted net income of $37 million and fully diluted adjusted earnings per share of $0.20, meeting our Q1 SF&S guidance of $0.25 and missing the low-end of our mortgage outlook by $0.05. Our SF&S businesses met first quarter earnings guidance, and the company generated $37 million in adjusted net income or adjusted earnings per diluted share of $0.20.
